nodes.text: The Republicanists were a faction of Selonians who sought Selonia's planetary repulsor as a bargaining chip. They wished to turn it over to the New Republic in return for a guarantee of Selonia's sovereignty within the New Republic and the Corellian sector government. The Hunchuzuc Den was a Selonian den affiliated with this group and often fought the Absolutists in an undeclared Selonian Civil war.
